org.sensorhub.impl.sensor

Class AbstractSensorModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.module.AbstractModule<ConfigType>
      • org.sensorhub.impl.sensor.AbstractSensorModule<ConfigType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ConfigType -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventProducer, IDataProducerModule<ConfigType>, IModuleWithDescription, IModule<ConfigType>, ISensorModule<ConfigType>

    public abstract class AbstractSensorModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>
extends AbstractModule<ConfigType>
implements ISensorModule<ConfigType>

    Class providing default implementation of common sensor API methods. This can be used as the base for most sensor driver implementations.

    Since:
    Oct 30, 2014
    Author:
    Alex Robin

    • Method Detail

      • addOutput

        protected void addOutput(ISensorDataInterface dataInterface,
             boolean isStatus)
        Call this method to add each sensor observation or status output
        Parameters:
        dataInterface - interface to add as sensor output
        isStatus - set to true when registering a status output

      • addLocationOutput

        protected void addLocationOutput(double updatePeriod)
        Helper method to add a location output so that all sensors can update their location in a consistent manner.
        Parameters:
        updatePeriod - estimated location update period or NaN if sensor is mostly static

      • removeAllOutputs

        protected void removeAllOutputs()
        Removes all outputs previously added to this sensor

        Call this method to add each sensor control input

        public net.opengis.sensorml.v20.AbstractProcess getCurrentDescription()
        Description copied from interface: ISensorModule
        Retrieves most current sensor description.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentDescription in interface IModuleWithDescription
        Specified by:
        getCurrentDescription in interface ISensorModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>
        Returns:
        AbstractProcess SensorML description of the data producer or null if none is available at the time of the call

      • getLastDescriptionUpdate

        public long getLastDescriptionUpdate()
        Description copied from interface: IModuleWithDescription
        Used to check when SensorML description was last updated. This is useful to avoid requesting the object when it hasn't changed.
        Specified by:
        getLastDescriptionUpdate in interface IModuleWithDescription
        Returns:
        Date/time of last description update as unix time (ms since 1970) or Long.MIN_VALUE if description was never updated.

      • updateSensorDescription

        protected void updateSensorDescription()
        This method should be called whenever the sensor description needs to be regenerated.
        This default implementation reads the base description from the SensorML file if provided and then appends the unique sensor identifier, time validity and the description of all registered outputs and control inputs. This will also update the lastUpdatedSensorDescription time stamp and send a SENSOR_CHANGED event when
        Throws:
        SensorException

      • notifyNewDescription

        protected void notifyNewDescription(long updateTime)

      • updateLocation

        protected void updateLocation(double time,
                  double x,
                  double y,
                  double z)
        Updates the sensor location. If a sensor location output is present, the new location will be send through this interface. The location provided in the SensorML description will also be updated unless it references the location output.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        z -

      • getCurrentFeatureOfInterest

        public net.opengis.gml.v32.AbstractFeature getCurrentFeatureOfInterest()
        Description copied from interface: IDataProducerModule
        Retrieves the feature of interest for which this producer is currently generating data.

        In the case of a module generating data from multiple entities (e.g. sensor network), the feature of interest currently observed by a given entity can be retrieved using IMultiSourceDataProducer.getCurrentFeatureOfInterest(String)
        Specified by:
        getCurrentFeatureOfInterest in interface IDataProducerModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>
        Returns:
        map of entityID to feature objects

      • updateConfig

        public void updateConfig(ConfigType config)
                  throws SensorHubException
        Description copied from interface: IModule
        Updates the module's configuration dynamically.
        The module must honor this new configuration unless an error is detected. It is the responsability of the module to initiate a restart if the new configuration requires it.
        Specified by:
        updateConfig in interface IModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>
        Overrides:
        updateConfig in class AbstractModule<ConfigType extends SensorConfig>
        Throws:
        SensorHubException
